info.title: Microsoft Power Platform REST API
info.description: Unified API for all administrative capabilities in Microsoft Power Platform

post.summary: Add the environment to the environment group.
Remove the environment from the environment group.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payload for the Environment Management Setting

get.summary:
Gets Environment Management Setting by Id.  Only columns provided in the $select queryOption will be returned.
A list of selectable properties is defined in the Microsoft.Dynamics.Artemis.Infrastructure.Models.EnvironmentManagementSetting type.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of records to retrieve. If not set, 500 records are returned.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: List of properties to select for this entity.

patch.summary: Updates fields on a EnvironmentManagementSetting. This API currently doesn't return any entity data in the response body.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: The Id for the EnvironmentManagementSetting being updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Details on the EnvironmentManagementSetting to be updated

CreateEnvironmentManagementSettingRespon.description: Represents the response object for APIs in this service.

objectResult.description: Gets or sets the Id of the entity being created in the response

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the nextLink if there are more records to be returned

responseMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message.

GetEnvironmentManagementSettingResponse.description: Represents the response object for APIs in this service.

objectResult.description: Gets or sets the fields for the entities being queried

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the nextLink if there are more records to be returned

responseMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message.

OperationResponse.description: Represents the response object for APIs in this service.

objectResult.description: Gets or sets the response's object

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the nextLink if there are more records to be returned

debugErrors.description: Gets or sets DebugErrors, only shown for private/local testing

responseMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message.
